General.Name: Shanghai Metersbonwe Fashion&Accessories Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Metersbonwe Fashion and Accessories Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and distributes casual wear products in China. It offers its products under the Metersbonwe, MECITY, MECITYKIDS, and Moomoo brand names. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No.800, East Kangqiao Road, Shanghai, China, 201319

1.Name: Mr. Tu  Ke
